pullrequest.title: Prevent GUI from jumping around, pixel saving, analysis submission improvements

content.raw:
Aha, found it! A single character bug.

In the mainloop of the analysis submission, it waits for signals for what to do, and if that times out after 10 seconds it instead sets signal to 'check/retry' to check connectivity.

However I had written `signal == 'check/retry'` instead of `signal = 'check/retry'`. Meaning that line did nothing and instead the signal from the last iteration of the mainloop was processed again (submitting the shot file again).

I've pushed the fix.
